color.div:
The
Orb Piercer is a most dangerous creature which roams the waters of the
4th Layer. It mainly appears during night time, to easily hunt unweary pray. It considers the
Flat Creepers as its territory, so be weary when traversing them. :hypers:
§#1fab44-#fcc82b-#423924§Behaviour Details:
Orb Piercers are known to be ferocious creatures that uses its long spikes to inject poison into its target. If it cannot reach its target, it will also attempt to shoot a cluster of its spikes at the target.
:hypers:
§#1fab44-#fcc82b-#423924§Item Drops:
If you manage to slay one, be sure to harvest parts from its corpse. We currently know that its
spikes and
face fragments can be considered useful.
